TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StateRuntime extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.IStateRuntime
Public NotInheritable Class StateRuntime Implements IStateRuntime
public ref class StateRuntime sealed : System::Web::SessionState::IStateRuntime

summary.span: 管理 ASP.NET 状态服务中存储的会话数据。

span.span: Manages session data stored in the ASP.NET state service.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持选择使用称为 ASP.NET 状态服务的 Windows 服务管理进程外会话状态。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 此服务中的非托管代码使用类来管理会话数据。The class is used by unmanaged code in this service to manage session data. 此类支持 ASP.NET 状态服务的 .NET Framework 基础结构实现，不应在代码中直接使用。This class supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. ASP.NET 状态服务不是 ASP.NET 会话状态管理的默认方法;默认情况下，ASP.NET 支持会话状态的进程内管理。The ASP.NET state service is not the default method of ASP.NET session-state management; ASP.NET supports an in-process management of session state by default. 它还支持第二个进程外选项，该选项管理 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库中的会话状态，并启用自定义会话状态管理解决方案。It also supports a second out-of-process option that manages session state in a Microsoft SQL Server database and enables custom session-state management solutions. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅 [会话状态模式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178586(v=vs.100))。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178586(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员支持 ASP.NET 状态服务的 .NET Framework 基础结构实现，不应在代码中直接使用。This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅 [会话状态模式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178586(v=vs.100))。For more information about session-state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178586(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 状态服务器用于处理会话数据。

span.span: Used by the ASP.NET state server to process session data.
ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.name: tracker
param.span: 指向存储在非托管 ASP.NET 状态服务器中的某个对象的 指针。

span.span: An pointer to an object stored in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

param.name: verb
param.span: 要对该对象执行的操作。

span.span: The action to take on the object.
An identifier for the session.

param.name: exclusive
param.span: 存储区中的对象的访问类型。

span.span: The type of access to objects in the store.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 存储会话数据的分钟数。

span.span: The number of minutes the session data is stored.

param.name: lockCookieExists
param.span: 指示在从 ASP.NET Web 服务器到 ASP.NET 状态服务器的原始请求中是否存在锁 Cookie 的值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the lock cookie exists in the original request from the ASP.NET Web server to the ASP.NET state server.

param.name: lockCookie
param.span: 会话状态上的锁的所有者。

span.span: The owner of the lock on the session state.

param.name: contentLength
param.span: 为该会话存储的数据的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length, in bytes, of the data stored for the session.

param.name: content
param.span: 指向非托管 ASP.NET 状态服务器中为该会话存储的内容的 指针。

span.span: An pointer to the content stored for the session in the unmanaged ASP.NET state server.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopProcessing() cil managed
abstract member StopProcessing : unit -> unit override this.StopProcessing : unit -> unit

summary.span: 停止对存储在 ASP.NET 状态服务器中的会话数据的处理。

span.span: Stops the processing of session data stored in the ASP.NET state server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持选择使用称为 ASP.NET 状态服务的 Windows 服务管理进程外会话状态。ASP.NET supports the option of managing session state out-of-process using a Windows service called the ASP.NET state service. 此服务中的非托管代码使用方法来停止处理会话数据。The method is used by unmanaged code in this service to stop processing the session data. 提供此成员是为了支持 ASP.NET 状态服务的 .NET Framework 基础结构实现，不应在代码中直接使用。This member is provided to support the .NET Framework infrastructure implementation of the ASP.NET state service and is not intended be used directly from your code. 有关会话状态存储选项的详细信息，请参阅 [会话状态模式](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178586(v=vs.100))。For more information about session state storage options, see [Session-State Modes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178586(v=vs.100)).

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview
